content: As an AI language model, I am not capable of knowing how difficult every German speaker finds it to learn verb conjugation, but generally speaking, it can be challenging for non-native speakers to learn the complex system of German verb conjugation. However, with practice and memorization, it is possible to develop a good understanding of the rules and patterns. German learners often find that with time and exposure to the language, the conjugation rules become more intuitive and natural. It is important to note that like any language, becoming proficient in German requires dedication and practice over an extended period of time.
